input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='8mm Thick Gold Herringbone Chain Hip Hop Jewelry Gold Plated'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Black Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Iced Out Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Youth Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='The GLD Shop Cuban Link Necklace 5mm Size'
  - Name='JAXXON Gold Iced Out Cuban Link Ring'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='GLD Cuban Link Chain in Gold-Plated'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 26" Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Youth Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 26" Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Pearl Necklace, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON Iced Out Mariner Gold Chain, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link design and gold material but it is a bracelet, not a chain necklace and thinner gauge (5mm vs 8mm).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 8mm Thick Gold Herringbone Chain Hip Hop Jewelry Gold Plated
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same 8mm thickness and gold color, but the chain style is herringbone, not Cuban link, which is a significantly different silhouette and construction.
Same brand, 8mm Cuban link, but colored black instead of gold, and it is described as a set which may include additional pieces beyond a chain.
Almost identical: same brand, 8mm, Cuban link chain style, but 'iced out' means embellished with stones which differs somewhat from plain gold.
Same brand and Cuban link design but a bracelet, likely smaller and different product type than the 8mm chain necklace.
Same Cuban link style and brand but smaller gauge (5mm) aimed at youth and presumably a necklace like the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link chain, but thicker 10mm and silver color and iced out stones, plus comes as a set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The GLD Shop Cuban Link Necklace 5mm Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type and design (Cuban link necklace) but thinner 5mm gauge and different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Gold Iced Out Cuban Link Ring
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares brand and Cuban link style but is a ring, not a chain, differing in product function and form.
Same brand and Cuban link gold chain style, thicker gauge (10mm) and sold as a set, making it very similar but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GLD Cuban Link Chain in Gold-Plated
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link gold chain type and style, but gold-plated rather than solid, and different brand.
Nearly identical: same brand, 8mm Cuban link chain in gold, although sold as a set which may include extras.
Same brand and Cuban link design in chain form but silver color and specific length noted, which slightly differs from reference.
Same brand, 8mm Cuban link style, youth sizing; very relevant but possibly smaller and targeted at younger customers.
Same brand and gold Cuban link chain but thicker gauge (10mm) than 8mm reference.
Very similar Cuban link chain from same brand, likely similar construction, differs in not specifying gauge or color but presumably similar.
Same brand and gauge (8mm) with Cuban link design, but silver material and packaged as a set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link style but thinner 5mm, iced out embellishments and sold as a set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link gold style but a bracelet, thicker 10mm gauge, and iced out with stones.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar brand and style but thinner 5mm gauge, iced out, and a set, differing from plain 8mm chain.
Same brand, 8mm Cuban link necklace but incorporates pearls which changes style and construction significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Iced Out Mariner Gold Chain, 20"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and gold chain but different chain style (mariner vs Cuban), and iced out embellishment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link style and brand, but thinner 5mm gauge, silver color, iced out, and in a set format.
